scripts.claude-code: docker compose -f .claude/docker-compose.claude.yml run --rm --remove-orphans -it claude-code-sandbox bash -c 'claude; exec'
scripts.claude-code:unrestricted: docker compose -f .claude/docker-compose.claude.yml run --rm --remove-orphans -it claude-code-sandbox bash -c 'claude --dangerously-skip-permissions; exec'
